snippet: For the latest version of Michael Clark’s “Who’s Zoo?” at the Whitney Biennial, live music is provided by Pulp’s frontman, Jarvis Cocker.
abstract: Gia Kourlas reviews latest iteration of Michael Clark's dance piece Who's Zoo, featuring live music by Jarvis Cocker and Jason Buckle, at the Whitney Biennial.
lead_paragraph: For the latest version of Michael Clark’s “Who’s Zoo?” at the Whitney Biennial, live music is provided by Pulp’s frontman, Jarvis Cocker.

headline.seo: ‘Who’s Zoo?’ by Michael Clark at the Whitney
headline.main: A Rock Star May Steal the Show
headline.print_headline: A Rock Star May Steal The Show
